name: SoundMemo
description:
SoundMemo invites you to explore its lovingly animated worlds of sound:
on the lookout for matching sound pairs, you have to listen closely to everyday sounds, animal voices, noises of the body, instrumental sounds and musical pitches, and distinguish between them. So listen closely!

The illustrations by award-winning artist Gabriella Sperotto constitute the background for an acoustic journey through the various game levels. With each level, the difficulty increases, so even experienced listeners will be challenged. When one level is mastered, two more are unlocked.

When all levels are mastered, a special bonus will wait for the player: the bonus level is exceptionally tricky and thus can also be played by four players. Another surprise in the bonus level will not be revealed here!

Are you an attentive listener? Then you will have a lot of fun with SoundMemo!
